content.text: [@kas](@RuNxm8SRujPcJx6GjtTQHp6hprAFv5voEkcvoAkB8Pk=.ed25519) That *looks* to me like the pub isn't using SHS or something, but I'm not sure. It looks like it was added in [this commit](https://github.com/ssbc/multiserver/commit/eaf85f3cb0e6cac1424e2bcf3b58125df4463cf3), maybe [@dominic](@EMovhfIrFk4NihAKnRNhrfRaqIhBv1Wj8pTxJNgvCCY=.ed25519) knows more?
